channel.title: Wanted: Content Developers
channel.description:
We're looking for a small crew of up to 3 people to help in maintaining the server which momentarily rivals against the other top-10 servers.
Your job will include (but may not be limited to):
[ul][li] [b]Communication[/b] with staff, moderators and the community[/li] [li] [b]Frequent updates[/b] to existing content and [b]developing new content[/b][/li] [li] [b]Managing[/b] the server. This will be anything from rebooting, to solving database issues, etc, etc...[/li][/ul]
Skill-based prerequisites:
[ul][li] Java[/li] [li] Advanced Programming Topics (OOP - abstraction - inheritance - etc)[/li] [li] SQL (not directly crucial, but any experience here would be a plus)[/li] [li] Experience with hosting/managing a remote server is a plus[/li][/ul]
PM me with the following template to apply or with any questions you may have about the position.
[code] [b]Full name:[/b] [b]Country/state:[/b] [b]Age:[/b] [b]Skype:[/b] [b]e-mail:[/b] [b]Programming experience (show us your work):[/b] [b]Experience with private servers:[/b] [b][/b] [/code]
Considered applicants will receive a PM, a skype notification and an e-mail to schedule a brief interview on Skype.

item.title: Wanted: Content Developers
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

We’re looking for a small crew of up to 3 people to help in maintaining the server which momentarily rivals against the other top-10 servers.

Your job will include (but may not be limited to):

[ul][li] Communication with staff, moderators and the community[/li]
[li] Frequent updates to existing content and developing new content[/li]
[li] Managing the server. This will be anything from rebooting, to solving database issues, etc, etc…[/li][/ul]

Skill-based prerequisites:

[ul][li] Java[/li]
[li] Advanced Programming Topics (OOP - abstraction - inheritance - etc)[/li]
[li] SQL (not directly crucial, but any experience here would be a plus)[/li]
[li] Experience with hosting/managing a remote server is a plus[/li][/ul]

PM me with the following template to apply or with any questions you may have about the position.

[b]Full name:[/b]
[b]Country/state:[/b]
[b]Age:[/b]
[b]Skype:[/b]
[b]e-mail:[/b]
[b]Programming experience (show us your work):[/b]
[b]Experience with private servers:[/b]
[b][/b]

Considered applicants will receive a PM, a skype notification and an e-mail to schedule a brief interview on Skype.
